plugins.name: JSON Data Auto-Filler
plugins.description:
Figma Json Data Auto-Filler is a versatile plugin that simplifies the process of filling Figma components with JSON data. Designed to support dynamic and data-driven design workflows, this plugin enables designers and developers to quickly batch fill components with data, saving time and enhancing productivity.


💡 Features:

Load Local Files & Fetch Copied Data: Easily import JSON data from local files or clipboard.

Image Data Support: Seamlessly fill components with image data for richer designs.

Nested JSON Parsing: Handles JSON files with any level of nested data.

Flexible Key Selection: Choose specific keys to map JSON data to Figma components.

🎥 Watch the Demo Video:

See the plugin in action here: YouTube Demo


📚 Documentation:

For setup instructions, detailed usage, and tips, visit our documentation:

JSON Data Auto-Filler Documentation


🤙 Feedback:

If you encounter issues or have ideas for improving the plugin, we’d love to hear from you:

Submit Feedback


Elevate your design workflow by automating data entry with Figma Json Data Auto-Filler—ideal for anyone looking to streamline and supercharge their Figma experience!
plugins.tagline: Effortlessly Batch Fill JSON Data into Your Figma Designs

plugins.name: Tiiny Color Palette Generator
plugins.description:
Tiiny empowers you to generate natural color palettes with tints and shades in 12 stops, based on your chosen base color.


Key Features:

  1. Dynamic Palette Generation: Automatically generate a cohesive color palette with multiple shades and tints tailored to your base color, ensuring visual consistency across your project.
  2. Customizable Formats: Choose between RGB, HSL, and HSB color formats to suit your specific design needs and preferences.
  3. Accessibility Focused: Designed with accessibility in mind, ensuring that your color choices are both visually appealing and inclusive.


Transform your design process with the Tiiny Color Palette Generator and bring vibrant, cohesive colors to your projects with just a few clicks. Elevate your creativity and ensure consistency across all your design endeavors!
plugins.tagline: Create natural looking color palettes with 12 stops, for your designs.

  3. Accessibility Focused: Designed with accessibility in mind, ensuring that your color choices are both visually appealing and inclusive.


Transform your design process with the Tiiny Color Palette Generator and bring vibrant, cohesive colors to your projects with just a few clicks. Elevate your creativity and ensure consistency across all your design endeavors!

plugins.name: Sections
plugins.description:
Organize the sections in your file in a few clicks.


How it works:


  1. Launch: CMD+K and type "Sections".
  2. Choose direction: vertical or horizontal.
  3. Set spacing: 100, 250, or 500px presets. (Custom coming soon!)
  4. Apply: Watch Sections organize the sections in your file.


Be default Sections will apply changes to all the sections on the page. If 2 or more sections are selected, then changes will only apply to those.


🍻Cheers to cleaner Figma files.
plugins.tagline: Auto layout your sections.

plugins.name: 竹记 - 创意过程记录&实时预览
plugins.description:
1. To use Bamboo Record, you need to install both plug-ins and desktop software. The software can be installed through the official website https://zj.freshart.top/
  2. Please make sure that the plug-ins and software are always on during use;
  3. If you need to use other plug-ins, it is recommended to turn on the Bamboo Record plug-in again as soon as possible after use, otherwise it cannot be recorded;
  4. Bamboo Record will record each design change when running, which can be viewed randomly, and supports exporting the design process to video;
  5. It is better to determine the width and height of the drawing board before running the plug-in. It is not recommended to modify the width and height of the drawing board during the recording process;
  6. In addition, Bamboo Record provides a free real-time preview function that supports multi-device code scanning preview (to ensure that the computer and mobile terminals are on the same local area network and are allowed to pass through the firewall).


--------------


  1. 使用竹记需同时安装插件和桌面端软件，软件可通过官网安装（中文版） https://zj.94xy.com/
  2. 使用过程中请确保插件和软件一直处于开启状态；
  3. 如需使用其它插件，建议在使用之后，尽快再次开启竹记插件，否则无法记录；
  4. 竹记运行时会记录每一次设计变更，随机可以查看，支持将设计过程导出为视频：
  5. 在运行插件前就确定好画板宽高效果更佳，不建议在记录过程中修改画板宽高；
  6. 另外竹记提供了免费的实时预览功能，支持多设备扫码预览（使用需确保电脑端和移动端处于同一局域网，并允许通过防火墙）。
plugins.tagline: Record creative footprints and capture design moments

plugins.name: Queue Superman
plugins.description:
Main functions：

🦸 Queue Superman can group and layout the frames you select according to the field before the "/" in the frame name.

Before starting, you can also choose the spacing between each frame in the queue to ensure a consistent layout.


主要功能：

🦸 排队超人可以根据帧名称中斜线"/"前的字段，将您选择的帧进行分组和布局。

在开始之前，你还可以选择队列中每个帧之间的间距，以确保一致的布局。

plugins.name: PrinTriX (Precise CMYK Color Suite)
plugins.description:
🖨️ How to Use PrinTriX (Precise CMYK Color Suite)

PrinTriX is a tool designed for professionals who need accurate CMYK color control for print-ready designs. Here's how to get started:


  1. Go to the Color Palette tab


  1. Add your design colors (in RGB).


  1. Assign CMYK values to each RGB color for precise color mapping.


  1. Enable Color Palette Export: When exporting your design, make sure the Color Palette feature is enabled.


  1. PrinTriX will convert the colors of your design using your custom RGB→CMYK mappings.


With these steps, PrinTriX ensures consistent and high-quality CMYK output for your print files.


Whether you're working on marketing materials, packaging, or brand assets, PrinTriX allows designers to confidently transition from digital design to high-quality print. By supporting advanced features like color profile control, frame selection, and DPI adjustments, the plugin gives teams the precision and flexibility needed to meet even the most demanding print standards. With PrinTriX, maintaining visual consistency across all printed media becomes simple, reliable, and efficient—right from within Figma.

  1. Fine-tune colors with color palette feature that maps RGB colors to your desired CMYK color
  2. Select and organize only the frames you need
  3. Control DPI to balance print quality with file size.
  4. Export Designs to CMYK/Grayscale/RGB print-ready PDFs.
plugins.tagline: CMYK, Print, ColorProfile, PDF, Export, DPI, Bleed

137604.name: PrinTriX (Precise CMYK Color Suite)
137604.description:

plugins.name: QR Fast Generator
plugins.description:
📌 QR Fast Generator

QR Fast Generator es una herramienta rápida y sencilla para generar códigos QR personalizados directamente en Figma. Con soporte para múltiples formatos, permite crear códigos QR para enlaces, contactos, redes Wi-Fi y más, optimizando tu flujo de trabajo en diseño.


Ya sea para compartir información de contacto, redirigir a un enlace o generar accesos rápidos a plataformas como WhatsApp, QR Fast Generator te permite hacerlo en segundos, con opciones de personalización de color y tamaño. 🚀


Características Principales

  1. 🔗 Múltiples Tipos de QR: Crea códigos QR para URLs, WhatsApp, contactos (vCard), redes Wi-Fi y teléfonos en segundos.
  2. 🎨 Personalización Completa: Ajusta el color del QR, el fondo y el tamaño para adaptarlo a tu diseño.
  3. ⚡ Envío Directo a Figma: Genera el QR y agrégalo al documento de Figma con un solo clic, sin salir del plugin.
  4. 📥 Descarga Rápida: Guarda el QR en tu dispositivo en formato PNG para usarlo en otros proyectos.


¿Cómo Usarlo?

  1. Selecciona el Tipo de QR: Escoge entre URL, WhatsApp, Teléfono, vCard o Wi-Fi.
  2. Introduce los Datos: Completa los campos necesarios según el tipo de QR seleccionado.
  3. Personaliza el Diseño: Ajusta el color del código, el fondo y el tamaño.
  4. Genera y Visualiza el QR: Obtén una vista previa del código QR en tiempo real.
  5. Descarga o Envíalo a Figma: Guarda la imagen en tu dispositivo o insértala directamente en Figma con un solo clic.


Mejoras y Feedback

🚀 ¿Tienes ideas para mejorar QR Fast Generator? mándame un mensajini! 😎✨
plugins.tagline: QR Fast Generator es una herramienta rápida y sencilla para generar códigos QR

plugins.name: Font Replacer - Compact
plugins.description:
📝 Description

Transform your text styles in seconds! The fastest way to batch update font styles in Figma with minimal effort.


✨ Key Features

- One-click batch replacement for multiple text layers

- Lightning-fast font style updates

- Real-time font preview with instant search

- Auto-detect and display mixed text styles

- Seamless dark mode support

- Clean, minimal interface for maximum efficiency


🚀 Quick Start

1. Select text layers or frames

2. Pick your font settings

3. Click update - Done!


⚠️ Notes

- Ensure target fonts are installed in Figma

- Font names are case-sensitive

- Plugin automatically adapts to Figma's theme


🔧 Troubleshooting

Common issues and quick fixes:

- Font not updating? → Check if font is installed

- Text not changing? → Ensure layers are unlocked

- Nothing selected? → Select text layers first


If you have any suggestions, please feel free to let me know, thanks ❤

Contact: kingyo@live.com
plugins.tagline: A super efficient Figma plugin for replacing text styles with minimal clicks.

plugins.name: Bulk image exporter
plugins.description:
Speed up your workflow by exporting all images from your Figma page in just one click! This plugin collects every image and packs them into a handy ZIP file — no more exporting one by one.


You can also set a size limit (default: 1MB) to automatically compress images without losing too much quality. Perfect for quick exporting, sharing assets with devs and optimizing performance.


Features:


  1. Export all images on the current page in a ZIP file
  2. Set max size per image (e.g. 1MB or less)
  3. Check the current download status.
  4. Download each image individually


👉 Please note: this plugin is currently in beta, feedback is welcome!

accepted.name: Lorenzo Brandimarte
accepted.description: Product and UI Designer | No-code developer

plugins.tagline: Export every image on your page in a single ZIP

135102.description:

You can also set a size limit (default: 1MB) to automatically compress images without losing too much quality. Perfect for quick exporting, sharing assets with devs and optimizing performance.


Features:

135102.tagline: Export every image on your page in a single ZIP

120750.description: Elevate your design workflow with Font & Color Manager, the must-have Figma plugin that streamlines font and color editing in real time. Easily group, edit, and replace fonts while instantly updating color schemes across your projects. Built for speed and precision, this tool ensures design consistency and boosts productivity—ideal for designers searching for a seamless solution to optimize typography and color in Figma. 120750.tagline: Font & Color Manager – Ultimate Figma Plugin for Fast Typography & Color Editing

plugins.name: Hilbert
plugins.description:
Weave unique patterns with FASS curves.


FASS stands for 'space-Filling, self-Avoiding, Simple, and Self-similar curves' and they allow you to generate intricate patterns that are made with a single line. https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Space-filling_curve


How to use:


1) Select an object on your document and press "Pick".


->Your object will then be displayed as a clipping mask to help you preview the result.


2) Play.


3) Press "Place" to apply your artwork to the selected object.


-> The artwork will be clipped inside the object's geometry.


4) Select another object and press "Pick" to apply it as a the new clipping mask.


NOTE: For performance reasons this version is limited to a maximum of 5 iterations.


----------------------------------------------------------------

Want to support the development of free features and plugins?

You can buy me a coffee!

accepted.name: Eduardo Barbosa
accepted.description: Creative Technologist. I build tools and systems that enhance quality of life, unlock new possibilities, and empower teams and individuals.

plugins.tagline: Discover the creative potential of space-filling curves in Figma.

plugins.name: figma-lokalise-unofficial-plugin
plugins.description:
Unofficial Lokalise Plugin.


Enhance Your Design Workflow with Our Figma Plugin for Lokalise


Our plugin bridges the gap between Figma and Lokalise, offering a seamless integration that streamlines your design localization process. With this tool at your disposal, you can:


Link Texts Between Figma and Lokalise: Easily connect text elements from your Figma designs with corresponding texts in Lokalise, ensuring consistency and accuracy across your project.


Update All Texts with One Click: Synchronize all your design texts with Lokalise in just one click. This feature ensures that all your text elements in Figma are up-to-date with the latest translations and content changes.


Switch Texts to Different Languages Instantly: Our plugin allows you to effortlessly change the language of text elements in your Figma designs. This capability is perfect for quickly adapting your designs to various language markets.


Set Individual Text Elements: Gain the flexibility to specify translations for each text element within Figma individually. This feature provides the precision needed for customizing specific parts of your design to suit different linguistic contexts.


Full demo here: https://youtu.be/VPveQklO4OE


Support me at Patreon ❤️
plugins.tagline: Bridging Design and Localization in One Click

plugins.description:

Enhance your design workflow and ensure your exports are clear and informative!

plugins.name: X8 Content Machine
plugins.description:
Transforme seus carrosséis no Figma com inteligência, agilidade e personalização.


X8 Content Machine é um plugin inteligente que automatiza a inserção de textos, imagens e paletas de cores diretamente nos seus templates do Figma. Ideal para designers, social medias e equipes de marketing, ele permite montar carrosséis visualmente incríveis em poucos cliques.


⚙️ Funcionalidades principais:

  1. Aplicação automática de textos em múltiplos frames com organização por tópicos.
  2. Upload e ordenação de imagens com visualização numerada e arraste para reordenar.
  3. Paletas de cores personalizadas e pré-definidas, com suporte a edição e preview em tempo real.l.


🚀 Interface intuitiva com abas separadas para textos, imagens e cores.


🔁 Integração perfeita com o Figma, mantendo o fluxo de criação rápido e fluido.


💡 Perfeito para quem quer:

Ganhar tempo na criação de conteúdo visual.

Padronizar projetos com rapidez.

Automatizar a produção de artes para redes sociais.
plugins.tagline: Altere textos, imagens e cores de templates figma em alguns cliques

plugins.name: Color Mapper
plugins.description:
Effortlessly swap and remap colors in your designs while preserving library styles. Perfect for theme switching, brand updates, and design system management.

Key Features:


Intuitive drag-and-drop color remapping

Smart library style preservation

Batch update multiple elements at once

Support for both direct colors and style swatches

Works with fills and strokes


Simply select elements, drag colors to remap them, and apply changes with a single click. Color Mapper automatically detects and preserves your library styles while making color updates lightning fast.

plugins.name: Thumb Zone AI
plugins.description:
The Thumb Zone plugin enables you to add your frames to the platform and test it with your users. This plugin can be used for mobile UIs and allows you to perform various types of tests such as UI audit, predicting user behavior, conducting tests with synthetic users, as well as testing with real users to study their emotions.


To add a file from Thumb Zone to Figma, follow the steps below:


  1. Install the plugin.
  2. Define a new product in Thumb Zone.
  3. Select the "Import from Figma" option in Thumb Zone.
  4. Generate a token.
  5. Enter the received token in the Figma plugin.
  6. Select the frames.
  7. Sync!


Frames are synced to Thumb Zone screens, build and test your flow!


Visit https://thumbzone.ai to create your account.

accepted.name: Thumb Zone
accepted.description: AI copilot for mobile user testing

plugins.tagline: Emotion AI for Product Experience

plugins.name: Version Stack
plugins.description:
Version Stack allows you to create and manage multiple versions of selected frames in Figma with ease. Each version is automatically saved with a timestamp and arranged in a dedicated “Version Stack” page using an auto-layout for seamless tracking. Forget manual duplication—this plugin ensures that your design iterations are neatly organized and easily accessible.


How to Use:


1.Select a frame you want to save as a version.

2.Run the plugin, and click 'Save Version' . A new version with a timestamp will be saved in the “Version Stack” page.

3.Each version is stacked vertically in an auto-layout, allowing you to track the evolution of your design effortlessly.


Important Note:

The frame name must remain the same for new versions to be added to the existing version stack.


Limitations:


•Works only with Frame nodes.

•Ensure the “Version Stack” page is not renamed manually to avoid issues.


We Value Your Feedback:

We’re constantly looking to improve! If you have any suggestions, feedback, or feature requests, please share them with us. Your input will help make Version Stack even better for you and the design community. Thank you for using our plugin!
plugins.tagline: Effortlessly save and manage design versions in an organized layout

plugins.name: Defold Handoff
plugins.description:
With this plugin, you can easily manage GUI template designs and atlases, streamlining the resource handoff process for the Defold game engine. It features a robust customization system for GUI nodes, a Slice 9 generator/editor, and various support utilities and export tools.


Atlases:


  1. Create and manage sprite atlases directly within your Figma project.
  2. Bundle or combine atlases for streamlined export.
  3. Export atlases and image resources for your Defold project with a single click.


GUI Nodes:


  1. Design Defold GUI templates as simple frames in Figma.
  2. Fully leverage Figma's design tools without any limitations from Defold's side.
  3. Edit additional GUI node properties using the custom editor.
  4. Export GUI templates as they are, or bundled with atlases and other resources.
  5. Includes additional support utilities for developers.
plugins.tagline: Streamlines Defold's GUI template design handoff process from Figma

127480.name: Defold Handoff
127480.description:
With this plugin, you can easily manage GUI template designs and atlases, streamlining the resource handoff process for the Defold game engine. It features a robust customization system for GUI nodes, a Slice 9 generator/editor, and various support utilities and export tools.

  1. Create and manage sprite atlases directly within your Figma project.
  2. Bundle or combine atlases for streamlined export.
  3. Export atlases and image resources for your Defold project with a single click.


GUI Nodes:


  1. Design Defold GUI templates as simple frames in Figma.

  3. Edit additional GUI node properties using the custom editor.
  4. Export GUI templates as they are, or bundled with atlases and other resources.
  5. Includes additional support utilities for developers.
127480.tagline: Streamlines Defold's GUI template design handoff process from Figma

plugins.name: Chameleon
plugins.description:
🦎 CHAMELEON


Chameleon is a Figma plugin that turns color token management into a breeze. Build smart palettes, structure tokens, and export directly into native Figma Variables.



🎨 KEY FEATURES


🎨 Smart palette generation — create harmonious color ramps from a single base color


🌒 Auto dark theme — instantly generate dark versions of your palettes


♿ A11Y mode — contrast-optimized palettes that meet WCAG accessibility standards


🧷 Figma Variables export — full support for collections, modes, and cross-collection aliases


📤 JSON import/export — compatible with Figma Variables and Token Studio


✏️ Flexible structure — rename shades, palettes, collections, and modes while preserving links



🌒 AUTO DARK THEME


Instantly generate perceptually balanced dark palettes based on your light theme.


How it works:

  1. Inverts brightness scale: lightest shade (50) becomes darkest, darkest (900) becomes lightest
  2. Base color remains at position 500
  3. Brightness follows a perceptual (non-linear) scale
  4. Saturation is increased for dark shades, reduced for light ones
  5. Additional correction ensures visual harmony



🎨 BASE MODE


Best for:

  1. Creating aesthetic palettes without strict contrast rules
  2. Branding and accent color systems
  3. Visually balanced UIs with emphasis on artistic control


Generation logic:

  1. Base color is placed at center (shade 500)
  2. Builds out lighter (50–400) and darker (600–900) shades
  3. Brightness and saturation adjust relative to the base



♿ A11Y MODE


Palettes generated with perceptual brightness, ensuring strong contrast between shades.


Best for:

  1. Interfaces requiring WCAG compliance
  2. Government, medical, educational and fintech products
  3. Inclusive design for wide audiences


Generation logic:

  1. Builds a scale of perceived brightness
  2. Base color is positioned where its brightness fits best
  3. Shades are calibrated for target contrast
  4. Contrast between neighbors ≥ 1.3:1



📌 HOW TO USE


  1. Create your base palettes in the "Global" tab (5 to 15 shades)
  2. Enable A11Y mode if needed
  3. Switch between light and dark themes to evaluate the result
  4. Export everything to Figma Variables or JSON
  5. Youtube



⚙️ UINDER YHE HOOD


  1. HSL-based ramp generation
  2. Edge brightness: Light — 95% → 20%, Dark — 15% → 85%
  3. Auto positioning of base color (especially in A11Y mode)
  4. Built-in WCAG contrast checker
  5. Visual base marker (★)
  6. Full support for Figma Variables & Token Studio structure



🚧 STATUS


This plugin is in beta. We welcome feedback and are actively improving it.
plugins.tagline: Color token generator with automatic shade scales and Figma Variables export

131165.name: Chameleon

  4. Contrast between neighbors ≥ 1.3:1



📌 HOW TO USE


  1. Create your base palettes in the "Global" tab (5 to 15 shades)
  2. Enable A11Y mode if needed
  3. Switch between light and dark themes to evaluate the result
  4. Export everything to Figma Variables or JSON
  5. Youtube



⚙️ UINDER YHE HOOD


  1. HSL-based ramp generation
  2. Edge brightness: Light — 95% → 20%, Dark — 15% → 85%
  3. Auto positioning of base color (especially in A11Y mode)
  4. Built-in WCAG contrast checker
  5. Visual base marker (★)
  6. Full support for Figma Variables & Token Studio structure



🚧 STATUS


This plugin is in beta. We welcome feedback and are actively improving it.
131165.tagline: Color token generator with automatic shade scales and Figma Variables export

plugins.name: Figma to JSON Exporter

Figma to JSON Exporter simplifies extracting design variables, styles, and components from your Figma file into a structured JSON format. With one click, copy design tokens (colors, typography, spacing, and more) for seamless integration into your development pipeline. This plugin saves time, ensures design consistency, and supports UI/UX designers, front-end developers, and teams managing design systems.


Designed & developed by Shakuro team: https://shakuro.com/

plugins.name: FigTextExporter
plugins.description:
# FigText Exporter: AI-Powered Translation Export Plugin for Figma


Transform your Figma text layers into translation-ready JSON files instantly with FigText - the smart localization assistant for designers and developers.


## Key Features


- *Automatic Text Detection:* Scans your Figma files and identifies all text layers that need translation

- *Smart JSON Generation:* Creates structured JSON translation files with nested keys based on your design hierarchy

- *Multi-Language Support:* Export translation files for multiple languages simultaneously

- *Context Preservation:* Maintains the original context of text elements for more accurate translations


## Benefits


- *Time Savings:* Convert hours of manual work into seconds of automated processing

- *Improved Workflow:* Seamlessly integrate with your development pipeline

- *Error Prevention:* Reduce human error in translation file creation

- *Team Efficiency:* Perfect for small teams looking to streamline their localization process


🚀 Stop spending valuable time on manual translation file creation. Let FigText handle the tedious work while you focus on what matters most - creating amazing designs.


## How It Works


1. Select your text layers in Figma

2. Run FigText plugin

3. Choose your target languages

4. Get your translation-ready JSON files instantly


Perfect for developers and designers who want to maintain productivity without getting bogged down by repetitive localization tasks.
plugins.tagline: Easily export and translate text from figma projects

plugins.name: Bulk replace corner radius
plugins.description:
Quickly change corner radius in multiple elements, such as frames or components. You can update specific radius to another value, for example all 2px to 4px, all 4px to 8px, etc.


  1. Select elements
  2. Run plugin
  3. Bulk change your border radius - leave the field empty if you don't want to change some value
  4. Apply changes
plugins.tagline: Replace all border radius in selection

plugins.name: Stroke Shortcuts
plugins.description:
A tool for quickly adjusting stroke settings of Figma objects.


Key features:

• Increase/decrease stroke weight (+1/-1)

• Cycle stroke position inside/outside

• Apply to multiple selected objects at once


Streamline your design workflow and make stroke adjustments with ease.


---


Figmaオブジェクトのストローク設定を素早く調整するプラグインです。


主な機能：

• ストロークの太さを増減（+1/-1）

• ストロークの位置を内側/外側に切り替え

• 選択したオブジェクトに一括適用可能


デザインワークフローを効率化し、ストローク調整を簡単に行えます。
plugins.tagline: Stroke Control: A shortcut plugin for quick stroke weight and position adjustments

plugins.name: Local Variables Starter
plugins.description:
Figma Plugin Local Variables Starter


A Figma plugin starter kit that helps you create local variables from predefined design tokens. This plugin automatically generates color, spacing, typography, and radius variables in your Figma file.


Features


  1. 🎨 Color variables with RGB values
  2. 📏 Spacing system (including negative values)
  3. 📝 Typography settings (size, weight, line height)
  4. 🔄 Border radius presets
  5. ✨ Customizable collection and mode names
  6. 🔄 Resizable plugin window
  7. ✅ Selective token category generation
plugins.tagline: A starter kit that helps you create local variables from predefined design tokens.

113944.description:

plugins.name: m16n
plugins.description:
{
    "general": {
        "sample" :[
            "The text layer named 'general.sample' will be changed this string when '0' is selected.",
            "'1' を選択すると、'general.sample' という名称のテキスト要素がこのテキストに書き換わります。"
        ],
        "back": [
            "back",
            "戻る"
        ]
    },
    "stage_1": {
        "S_information": {
            "title": [
                "Information",
                "お知らせ"
            ]
        },
        "S_login": {
            "title": [
                "Sign in ",
                "ログイン"
            ]
        }
    }
}


How to use


  1. Specify text layer name according to the JSON hierarchy structure. (e.g. ) general.back or stage1.S_information.title
  2. Select the element you want to change.
  3. Launch plugin.
  4. Upload json file from button.
  5. If you select Language index "0",
  6. and press "Update word",
  7. then, for example, the value of text layer named "general.back" will be replaced to "back".


  • If the Target node is "Only selected Nodes", only selected elements are replaced. If "All", all elements are replaced. (The "All" option may not be able to process pages of enormous size.)
  • The language designation is an array number, so any numbers of languages can be added.
plugins.tagline: Manage multiple languages in a single json file.
